game.beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world where humanity has been wiped out by an unknown virus, you play as one of the few remaining survivors, a young woman named Aria.
game.ending: After gathering a small group of allies and navigating through the treacherous landscape, Aria discovers a possible cure for the virus and must make a choice that will determine the fate of humanity's last hope.
game.synopsis: In "Echoes of Eternity," you embark on a perilous journey to uncover the secrets behind the deadly virus, facing off against infected creatures and hostile factions vying for control. Along the way, Aria uncovers hints about her own mysterious past and the true nature of the world she lives in.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
